text: Someone knows what happened to a registered package if we transfer the ownership on github ? My guess is probably nothing (like automatic redicrection) but I would rather be sure beforehand ^^

elements.text: Someone knows what happened to a registered package if we transfer the ownership on github ? My guess is probably nothing (like automatic redicrection) but I would rather be sure beforehand ^^

text:
Correct nothing because of automatic redirect.
You should however update it's entry in the registry so that that is correct.
See the README.md for the General Registry

text: Thank you! Everything seems to be fixed, including the general registry :)
